text: if there's one thing we loved as a
modern society its pizza delivery but if
I had to pick something else
it's got to be shopping holidays now of
course there are commercial elements to
existing holidays like the way Rudolph
the Red Nosed Reindeer was created by an
American department store meant to help
sell more children's books or the way
that candy manufacturers cash in every
February of the 14th but Christmas and
actually even Valentine's Day already
existed and were not created by their
respective industries contrary to some
fairly popular myths but obviously we do
already have at least one day on the
calendar whose primary purpose is a
shameless celebration of spending money
on trinkets Black Friday which is
celebrated every year the day after US
Thanksgiving actually arose somewhat
organically as a busy shopping day since
it followed a holiday that many American
workers already had off only about a
month before Christmas
now although a popular explanation is
that the day is called Black Friday
because the boost in sales would push
retailers into the black the term
actually arose all the way back in the
1950s from police officers describing a
black day where they had to deal with
additional crowds congestion and traffic
and seeing is how we've celebrated Black
Friday for many years with a positive
Bacchanalia of fistfights in the
corridors of a shopping mall near you
along with other card giving holidays of
questionable origin like national bosses
day seems pretty good to me though it
probably shouldn't come as a surprise
that the powers that be over at Emma's
on saw that and went well what the hell
let's just create our own holiday and
thusly Prime Day was born back in 2015
now in case you have better things to do
with your summer then sit inside and
shop online prime day is now actually a
two-day event because why not
I guess with lots of special discounts
for Prime members not only our
prospective customers drawn in with
promises of great deals but Amazon tries
to keep people locked onto their screens
for as long as possible by offering new
deals every five minutes
now from a business standpoint Amazon
hyping up their own made-up holiday has
paid off big time from the start on the
first ever Prime day Amazon sales
actually outstripped its sales from the
previous Black Friday with nearly 400
orders being placed every second but
from a more purely tech perspective this
is a tech channel after all Amazon has
also used the immense popularity of this
holiday to heavily push its own gadgets
such as the echo dot which was the most
popular item on prime day in 2017 this
has substantially aided Amazon's efforts
to extend its spy never excuse me I mean
make life more convenient for its
customers and as Amazon's tentacles have
wrapped themselves around more and more
industries prime day has grown
accordingly prime Day 2018 featured an
entire week of special deals at Whole
Foods which is now owned by Amazon and
also saw the site sell more than 100
million different products in total
amounting to nearly 4 billion dollars in
sales clearly enough to cover Taylor
Swift's fee for the prime date concert
that Amazon put on this year so if you
want to dive into this mad frenzy of
capitalism
what should you keep in mind well first
up if you're not a Prime member you'll
need a subscription but a lot of people
assume that you have to pay a hundred
and nineteen dollars for a year-long
membership to take advantage of the
deals in fact you can pay just $12.99
for a one month membership then cancel
it the next month rather than wiping out
the savings with a triple digit hit to
your bank account also before you even
do that remember that even though a
prime day deal might look wonderful
Amazon doesn't always have the best
prices even on prime day so comparison
shopping is still worth the effort
especially since other prominent
retailers are now holding special sales
on prime day itself to compete directly
with Amazon now admittedly this can be
difficult if you're trying to beat the
clock for a flash or lightning deal but
shopping assistance like honey and camel
camel camel can help out a lot finally
if you do need to take advantage of a
short-term sale and buy with one click
make sure you've got the
payment info and address set as your
default ahead of time because you don't
want to get an incredible deal on a
snowboard just to have it shipped to
